name: Child of Light (itch)
description:
By Red Haircrow. 

"Child of Light" is a short text-based work of fantasy set in an ancient past. It tells the story of a young survivor and the hard choices she makes, and the consequences of her decisions. Even in the darkest of times, there can be a ray of light.  The story is based on a dream experienced by the author.

Graphic image by Red Haircrow, using images by Ary Ernest Renan (1857-1900) from Musée de la Vie romantique, and Francois Nicolas Chifflart (1825-1901). from Maison de Victor Hugo - Hauteville House.

They are public domain artworks offered through THE PUBLIC INSTITUTION PARIS MUSÉES COLLECTION http://parismuseescollections.paris.fr/en.
